definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) Montagu's harrier (Circus pygargus)
(bird species of China) hen harrier (Circus cyaneus)
(bird species of China) eastern marsh harrier (Circus spilonotus)
(bird species of China) Eurasian marsh harrier (Circus aeruginosus)
(bird species of China) pallid harrier (Circus macrourus)
(bird species of China) pied harrier (Circus melanoleucos)

sentences.english: Raptors include Marsh Harrier and Black winged Kite.
sentences.chinese: 猛禽包括沼泽鹞和黑翅鸢。

sentences.english: The photo shows the prototype of Harrier.
sentences.chinese: 上图显示了鹞的原型机。

sentences.english: for photo of Northern Harriers, Bear River Migratory Bird Refuge, UT
sentences.chinese: 这张白尾鹞照片摄于犹他州贝尔河候鸟保护地。

sentences.english: My mama says sandpipers come to bring us joy.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈说，矶鹞到来，应当会给人们带来快乐。

sentences.english: It's a joy. My mama says sandpipers come to bring us joy.
sentences.chinese: 是快乐，矶鹞能给人们带来快乐，妈妈说的。

sentences.english: Most species of harrier are included in the genus Circus.
sentences.chinese: 大多数种类的鹞包含在鹞这个种属中。

sentences.english: Most species of harrier are included in the genus Circus.
sentences.chinese: 大多数种类的鹞包含在鹞这个种属中。

sentences.english: The bird went glissading down the beach.
sentences.chinese: 那只矶鹞顺着海滨飞走了。

sentences.english: Harrier (AV8B) can now perform Short takeoff and vertical landing (STOVL).
sentences.chinese: “鹞”式现在可以短距起飞，并能垂直降落。

definition: (bird species of China) western osprey (Pandion haliaetus)
name used for many fishing birds/cormorant/osprey
